name: git-angular
description: Extension to help for people who like using the Angular git convention

gitAngular.allowNewTypes.title: Allow New Types
gitAngular.allowNewTypes.description: Allow new types to be typed in during commit process

gitAngular.types.title: Types
gitAngular.types.description: Main type of the commit (fix, feature, test, etc)

default.build: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies
default.ci: Changes to CI configuration files and scripts
default.perf: A code change that improves performance
default.style: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white space, formatting, missing, semi-colons, etc)
default.test: Adding missing tests / correcting existing tests

gitAngular.allowNewScopes.title: Allow New Scopes
gitAngular.allowNewScopes.description: Allows new scopes to be typed in during commit process
